message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is closer to my bottom line. Could you meet me halfway at $12,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you at $12,000. I am willing to go up to $11,000 for the product. Would you be willing to consider this price?
